title: Modern Land misses bond payment

The post Modern Land misses bond payment appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
content:encoded:
On Oct 26, Reuters was ahead when Chinese property developer Modern Land said it would not make a bond payment, the latest in a string of Chinese firms including Evergrande that are struggling with liquidity.

The post Modern Land misses bond payment appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
